author: jnosek1
title: This Honey-Nut-Oat Shake Tastes Like Cereal
text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
Fruit and vegetable based shakes are a great way to consume more produce. But don’t forget about whole grains, those fiber-rich foods that help you stay fuller, longer and have been linked to better heart health. 
Push aside your skepticism of a grain-based shake and try this shake-it-up, wake-‘em-up beverage from the Men's Health Guy Gourmet cookbook . It’s as satisfying as it is delicious. Blend the following ingredients until smooth: Advertisement
